General.Name: Thai Plaspac Public Company Limited
General.Description: Thai Plaspac Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, designs, manufactures, and distributes rigid plastic packaging products in Thailand, India, Malaysia, and the United Arab Emirates. Its products include bottles and closure systems, cups, containers, and others. The company serves food and beverage, pharmaceutical, personal care, homecare, and industrial sectors. Thai Plaspac Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
General.Address: No.77, Soi Thian Thaley 30, Bangkok, Thailand, 10150
